title: You Should Become a Data Scientist. Here’s Why.

Introduction

Over the course of perhaps that past 10 years, data science has emerged as a front runner in the job market. Whereas some articles aim to write data science off as a career to no longer invest in, I am here to tell you the opposite. Not only has data science taken many forms recently, but it has also proved to be a job with high satisfaction. Additionally, this field can be quite lucrative with the median base salary of $107,801 [2]. This figure is without bonuses, stocks, or other incentives, which can add to this already high base salary. All in all, with a high median base salary, tremendous job satisfaction, and numerous job openings, data science is indeed a career and field to invest in and pursue. Below, I will elaborate on the reasoning and provide some beneficial insights as well.

Reasoning
https://miro.medium.com/max/18000/1*HIP3Ckk_vo9P28tzXqOkGw.jpeg

There are several benefits of being a data scientist and some of not being a data scientist (will elaborate later in this article). The main reasons can be summarized by job satisfaction, job openings, salary, and tools and skills learned:

Job Satisfaction — a reputable source, Glassdoor, has come up with “The Best Jobs in America 2020” [2], with the rank of number three overall being a data scientist. However, job stratification is actually the second-highest on this list after the strategy manager position. This rating is on a scale of 1.0 to 5.0, with a score of 4.0, data scientists can expect to be happy in their everyday work.

Job Openings — while job openings are not the highest on the list, there are still a considerable amount of 6,542 [2]. Being that there are a limited amount of degrees that you can obtain in data science over other careers that have higher job openings like that of a software engineer, the likelihood that you would get a data scientist position is still as high.

Salary — only two positions top the data scientist base salary in the top 10 jobs in America. With online learning, this high salary can be well worth investing in.
